general_requirements.statewide_program_name: AB 2188 Solar Permitting Efficiency Act - requires streamlined, expedited online permitting for rooftop solar under 10 kW. SB 379 mandates automated online permitting platforms for residential solar and storage. Fee cap: $450 + $15/kW above 15 kW.

interconnection.net_metering_details: California transitioned from NEM 2.0 to Net Billing Tariff (NEM 3.0/NBT) in April 2023 for new solar customers. Export rates reduced ~75% from ~30 cents/kWh to ~8 cents/kWh average. Time-of-use export rates vary by hour. Battery storage strongly incentivized. Existing NEM 1.0/2.0 customers grandfathered for 20 years.

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: Strong solar access law (Civil Code Section 714). HOAs cannot prohibit solar installations. Any restrictions that increase cost by more than $1,000 or decrease efficiency by more than 10% are void. Solar easements available.
special_considerations.historic_districts: Additional review required in designated historic districts. Certificate of appropriateness may be needed. Some jurisdictions exempt solar from historic review if not visible from public right-of-way.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Standard IBC wind load requirements. Coastal areas may have enhanced requirements. Design wind speeds typically 85-110 mph.
special_considerations.snow_load_requirements: Sierra Nevada mountain areas have significant snow loads (60-400+ psf ground snow load). CEC exempts buildings in high-snow-load areas from mandatory solar PV requirements where panels cannot comply with structural snow load requirements.

licensing.license_type: CSLB C-46 (Solar) or C-10 (Electrical) contractor license required. A-General Engineering or B-General Building may also install solar with appropriate scope.

notes: California is the largest solar market in the US with the most mature permitting infrastructure. The state mandates solar on new residential construction (2020 Title 24). NEM 3.0 significantly changed the economics, pushing the market toward solar+storage. SolarAPP+ adopted by many jurisdictions for instant permit approval. Permit fee caps keep costs controlled. The state has the most comprehensive consumer protections and standardized permitting requirements in the nation.

jurisdictions.name: Los Angeles
jurisdictions.fire_code_requirements: LAFD requires 3-ft setback from ridge and edges. Pathways for firefighter access required per CFC 605.11.

contacts.department: LA Dept of Building and Safety

jurisdictions.notes: AB 2188 mandates streamlined online permitting for rooftop solar <10 kW. Fee cap $450 + $15/kW above 15 kW.

jurisdictions.name: San Diego
jurisdictions.fire_code_requirements: Standard CFC setbacks. Pathways required for rooftop access.
special_requirements: Self-issued permits up to 38.4 kW AC with no plan review
jurisdictions.notes: Residential rooftop PV up to 38.4 kW AC self-issued with no plan review or structural review. Zero permit fee.

jurisdictions.name: San Jose
special_requirements: Instant online permitting for standard systems
jurisdictions.notes: Instant online permitting for standard residential systems. Traditional review mandatory for battery storage or older homes.

jurisdictions.name: San Francisco
jurisdictions.fire_code_requirements: SFFD setback requirements. Historic district installations may have additional fire access requirements.
jurisdictions.notes: Free solar permits. Historic districts may add several weeks to timeline. City targeting 100% renewable electricity.

jurisdictions.name: Sacramento
special_requirements: Expedited review for systems under 10 kW
jurisdictions.notes: Expedited review for systems under 10 kW. Fees determined by kW based on pre-determined fee schedule.

jurisdictions.name: Fresno
special_requirements: SolarAPP+ instant approval for single-family and duplex
jurisdictions.notes: SolarAPP+ adopted for instant permits on single-family and duplex projects.

jurisdictions.name: Long Beach
special_requirements: One-step process: submit, pay, receive inspection card same visit
jurisdictions.notes: Streamlined one-step permit process. Submit application, pay fees, receive job inspection card all at once.
